name: Royal Chess — Fragment
description: Endurance Chess demo. Queen on d1 and bishop on f1 recharge at home (+4/tick). Rook holds h8 deep in enemy territory (-3/tick). Black pawn races on a6 (-4/tick). Home territory and enemy terrain expressed via TYPE_OF tags on individual squares — no abstract zones.

entities.name: Chessboard
entities.description: 64 squares. Infinite decisions. Only seven matter today.

entities.name: Off Board
entities.description: The graveyard. Captured pieces reside here, stripped of purpose.

entities.name: a1
entities.description: Dark corner square. Kings hide here in endgames. Currently empty — a destination, not yet reached.

entities.name: a6
entities.description: Deep in white territory. The passed pawn's current outpost — three ranks from promotion.

entities.name: b3
entities.description: Light square. Currently empty — the archer has retreated home to recharge.

entities.name: c2
entities.description: Central light square. Currently empty — the queen has retreated home to recharge.

entities.name: d1
entities.description: White's queen starting square. Back-rank safety — pieces here recover endurance.

entities.name: f1
entities.description: White's light-squared bishop starting square. Back-rank safety — pieces here recover endurance.

entities.name: h8
entities.description: Far corner of the 8th rank. Deep in black's territory. The rook cut off all escape — but holding here is exhausting.

entities.name: White Queen
entities.description: The most powerful piece. Moves in all 8 directions, any distance. Exhausted from the last assault — retreated to d1 to recharge.

entities.name: White Archer
entities.description: Light-footed archer. Ranges across diagonals, never crossing to dark squares. Barely survived the exchange — back on f1 with a sliver of strength, quiver nearly empty.

entities.name: White h-Rook
entities.description: The rook that dared the 8th rank. Controls the entire row — but every tick in enemy territory drains its endurance.

entities.name: Black h-Pawn
entities.description: Black's last hope. Stranded on a6, racing toward promotion. Every tick counts.

entities.name: Move Counter
entities.description: Abstract tally of half-moves (plies) since the game began. A SUMS living on the board itself — a game-global statistic, not a physical object.

entities.name: White Legal Moves
entities.description: How many legal moves white can make this turn. Drops to 0 = stalemate. Abstract quantity — recomputed each tick by the engine (future feature).

entities.name: Black Threats
entities.description: How many white pieces are currently under attack or in danger. Zero now, but rising.
